'Sodium dodecylbenzenesulfonate' is a series of organic compounds with the
formula C 12 H25 C6 H4 SO 3Na.
It is a colourless salt with useful properties as a surfactant. It is usually
produced as a mixture of related sulfonates. It is a major component of laundry
detergent. Kurt Kosswig,"Surfactants" in Ullmann's Encyclopedia
of Industrial Chemistry, Wiley-VCH, 2005, Weinheim.
